analysis: The project appears to be a website about black holes with a focus on UI enhancements. The current state indicates that there are several pending tasks related to completing the HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files to ensure proper functionality and styling. The theme should be dark and cosmic, with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The existing files suggest that the website is intended to be interactive, with buttons and a mobile-friendly navigation menu.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.
Complete the JavaScript content to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality, including the mobile menu toggle and slide animations.
